Pet Manager Rood: Ready to do this? Today is a lucky day for both of us! Let me repeat what I told you earlier about Lienrik.Both Lienrik and Lienrik Lads can be found in the Rest Area of the Animals. Approach both carefully, as once can spew poison from a great distance. Both kinds lay eggs, but finding a female Lienrik is very rare. Well, if you can do this for me, I'll make it worth your while -- I promise! Even bringing back one would make my day!
